examples.example: 这位老师在教育界非常有名，他的教学方法深受学生们喜爱。

translate.english: This teacher is very famous in the field of education, and his teaching method is deeply loved by students.

examples.example: 这座古老的寺庙在当地非常有名，吸引了很多游客前来参观。

translate.english: This ancient temple is very famous in the local area and attracts a large number of tourists to come and visit.

examples.example: 这位画家因其独特的风格在艺术界赫赫有名，作品备受推崇。

translate.english: This painter is very famous in the art circle because of his unique style, and his works are highly praised.
